description.narrative: This activity (PROCOFSERVICES and P0053 for IPAP) is a component of International NGOS Partnerships Agreement Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,263,247. This component benefits India, and works in the following sector(s): Democratic participation and civil society. , with the following implementing partners: IPE Global Private Limited. The start date is 22-11-2006 and the end date is 30-03-2014.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
